career by working on highly innovative projectsWe offer you a well rewarding job in an inspiring environment with likeminded and talented colleagues You will become part of our inspiring company where ICT OFFICERNord Anglia Education NAE is the worlds leading premium schools organization, with 69 schools located across dozens of countries in the Americas, Europe, China, Southeast Asia, India and the Middle East Together, our schools educate over 67,000 students from kindergarten through to the end of secondary schoolFounded in 1959, Nord Anglia International School Rotterdam NAISR is a coeducational school for internationallyminded expatriate and Dutch families residing in the greater Rotterdam area We are a familyoriented school welcoming students from all cultures and religions We aim to provide learning opportunities that appropriately challenge every child, allowing them to happily learn in a safe and caring environment Our wellqualified staff endeavors to utilize best pedagogical practices to provide students with a wide variety of opportunities for success both inside and outside the classroomNord Anglia International School Rotterdam is currently looking for an ICT Officer that has the potential to develop into an ICT Manager role in the near futureAs an ICT Officer at NAISR, your key role will be the planning and implementation of IT solutions to support students, staff and ensure proper maintenance of our technical infrastructure including trouble shooting maintenance and IT security You will be responsible for the development and maintenance of standard operating IT procedures You will be responsible for the preparation and management of the annual ICT budget in close cooperation with the local management and regional IT manager Your problemsolving abilities and positive attitude will be apparent in the way you deal with staff and students You will be able to work in a team and equally capable of working independently You are fluent in English and in Dutch and have solid technical knowledge and communication skillsQualifications HBO levelWork experience 3 years or moreStarting salary EUR 45 K
